title: YouTube : all-time beauty content category views 2017
yAxis: Amount of category views in billions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Selected Cosmetics in the x axis and Amount of category views in billions in the y axis.
The Amount of category views in billions is highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
The highest Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall has 215.0 more Amount of category views in billions than the lowest Selected Cosmetics Nails.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Selected Cosmetics, and Amount of category views in billions in each Selected Cosmetics on the y axis.
The maximum Amount of category views in billions 219.0 is found at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and the minimum is found at Nails where Selected Cosmetics is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Selected Cosmetics in the x axis and Amount of category views in billions in the y axis.
The Amount of category views in billions is highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
The highest Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall has 215.0 more Amount of category views in billions than the lowest Selected Cosmetics Nails.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount of category views in billions for 9 number of Selected Cosmeticss.
The maximum Amount of category views in billions 219.0 is found at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and the minimum is found at Nails where Selected Cosmetics is 4.0.
Selected Cosmetics Cosmetics has the second highest value for Amount of category views in billions.
The difference of Amount of category views in billions between the highest and lowest Selected Cosmetics is 215.0.
Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall is higher than any other Selected Cosmeticss with value 219.0, followed by Cosmetics, and Hair. Down to Selected Cosmetics Nails with the lowest value 4.0.
The Selected Cosmetics Nails has 3.16 times less Amount of category views in billions than average.
The Amount of category views in billions is 624.0 if we add up values of all Selected Cosmeticss.
